== Philly / Southeastern Team BBQ Signup Page ==

August 11, 2007 from Noon-4PM.

=== Norristown Farm Park ===
<nowiki>[[http://www2.montcopa.org/parks/cwp/view,A,1441,Q,37325,parksNav,|.asp]]</nowiki>

Park at the Main Visitor's Parking lot, across from the park office and walk behind the park office, there are tables and a grill there.

Forum thread about the event: <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=509232]]</nowiki>
